--- create_table.sql
create table foo (
  foo int64,
  bar float64 not null,
  baz string(255) not null options(allow_commit_timestamp = null),
  qux string(255) not null as (concat(baz, "a")) stored,
  foreign key (foo) references t2 (t2key1),
  constraint fkname foreign key (foo, bar) references t2 (t2key1, t2key2),
  check (foo > 0),
  constraint cname check (bar > 0),
  quux json
) primary key (foo, bar)

--- AST

  Create: 0,
  Rparen: 389,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 13,
    NameEnd: 16,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name:    "foo",

        NamePos: 25,
        Name:    "INT64",

      NotNull:       false,

      Null: 50,

        NamePos: 34,
        NameEnd: 37,
        Name:    "bar",

        NamePos: 38,
        Name:    "FLOAT64",
      },

          ValuePos: 136,

            NamePos: 154,
            NameEnd: 160,

            &ast.Arg{
              Interval: -1,

        Name:    "foo",

      Dir: "",

      DirPos: -1,

        NamePos: 386,
        NameEnd: 389,
        Name:    "bar",
      },

    },

  TableConstraints: []*ast.TableConstraint{
    &ast.TableConstraint{
      ConstraintPos: 0,

    &ast.TableConstraint{
      ConstraintPos: 0,
      Name:          (*ast.Ident)(nil),
      Constraint:    &ast.Check{
        Check:  301,
        Rparen: 316,
        Expr:   &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   ">",
          Left: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 308,
            NameEnd: 311,
            Name:    "foo",
          },
          Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 314,
            ValueEnd: 315,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "0",

    &ast.TableConstraint{
      ConstraintPos: 320,
      Name:          &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 331,
        NameEnd: 336,
        Name:    "cname",
      },
      Constraint: &ast.Check{
        Check:  337,
        Rparen: 352,
        Expr:   &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   ">",
          Left: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 344,
            NameEnd: 347,
            Name:    "bar",
          },
          Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 350,
            ValueEnd: 351,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "0",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Cluster:           (*ast.Cluster)(nil),
  RowDeletionPolicy: (*ast.CreateRowDeletionPolicy)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE foo (foo INT64, bar FLOAT64 NOT NULL, baz STRING(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(allow_commit_timestamp = null), qux STRING(255) NOT NULL AS (concat(baz, "a")) STORED, quux JSON, FOREIGN KEY (foo) REFERENCES t2 (t2key1), CONSTRAINT fkname FOREIGN KEY (foo, bar) REFERENCES t2 (t2key1, t2key2), CHECK (foo > 0), CONSTRAINT cname CHECK (bar > 0)) PRIMARY KEY (foo, bar)
